name: New Bubble Crush Bird
description:
New Bubble Crush Bird - The brand new game in the popular Bubble game series.Smashing bubbles of the same 2 or 3 color. Smash big groups and score a lot of points!
This game's rules are simple. First you need to think strategically. You need to predict the best play to gather the most bubbles of the same color.
There are several difficulty levels which increase the bubble amount and introduce new colors.

The score is calculated multiplying the smashed bubble amount by that same number minus

High quality graphics. Includes sound effects that bring realism to the game.
